mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1992 Guest Artist Series
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the Barter Theatre 1992 Guest Artist Series. Productions include Gospel According to St. Mark, with Tom Stolz, May 12-31 | Ruth Draper's Cast of Characters, with Patrizia Norcia, June 2-14 | Escoffier: King of Chefs, with Owen S. Rackleff, June 16-28 | Love Letters by A. R. Gurney, June 30- July 12 | Walt Whitman: Liberal and Lusty as Nature, July 14-26.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:rights: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user. When using this item, users should give proper credit to the owner of the original object as well as to Virginia Tech Libraries.
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
